shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Introduction - Mäqdǝmä wängel “Introduction to the Gospels” (fols. 3ra-8ra) - Letter of Eusebius to Carpanius (fols. 8ra-8va) - The “Synopsis of Classes” (fols. 8vb-9ra) - Canon Tables (fols. 9v-12r) II) Gospel of Matthew (fols. 1ra-2vb, 13ra-63va) - Bǝsratä Matewos “Gospel of Matthew” (fols. 1ra-2vb, 13ra-63rb) - Postscript (fols. 63rb-63va) III) Gospel of Mark (fols. 63va-95va) - Biography of Mark (fols. 63va-63vb) - Bǝsratä Marqos “Gospel of Mark” (fols. 64ra-95rb) - Postscript (fols. 95rb-95va) IV) Gospel of Luke (fols. 95va-145rb) - Biography of Luke (fols. 95va-96ra) - List of the “Tituli” for the Gospel of Luke – 86 titles (fols. 96ra-96ar) - Bǝsratä Luqas “Gospel of Luke” (fols. 97ra-145rb) V) Gospel of John (fols. 146ra-181vb) - Bǝsratä Yoḥannǝs “Gospel of John” (fols. 146ra-180va)# - Postscript of the four Gospel (fol. 180va) - Biography of John (fols. 180vb-181va) - List of the “Tituli” for the Gospel of John – 20 titles (fols. 181va-181vb)
Additiones 1-10.

owners.owner: According to Additio 2, the Ms. was owned by ʾabba Yoḥannǝs ʾAfä Wärq.

bindings.binding: Two wooden board covered with tooled reddish-brown leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover. Quire XVII is reinforced by a parchment guard.

txfolios.txfolio: mutilated folio after fol. 96 is numbered fol. 96a

squires.squire: I(4-1; s.l. 3, stub before 1/fols. 1r-3v) – II(9; s.l. 1, stub after 9/fols. 4r-12v) – III(10/fols. 13r-22v) – IV(10/fols. 23r-32v) – V(10/fols. 33r-42v) – VI(10/fols. 43r-52v) – VII(11; s.l. 11, stub before 1/fols. 53r-63v) – VIII(10/fols. 64r-73v) – IX(10/fols. 74r-83v) –X(10/fols. 84r-93v) – XI(4/fols. 94r-96av) – XII(10/fols. 97r-106v) – XIII(10/fols. 107r-116v) – XIV(8/fols. 117r-124v) – XV(10/fols. 125r-134v) – XVI(10/fols. 135r-144v) – XVII(11; s.l. 1, stub after 11/fols. 145r-155v) – XVIII(10/fols. 156r-165v) – XIX(10/fols. 166r-175v) – XX(6/fols. 176r-181v) – B(2; s.l. 1, stub after 2; 2, stub after 2/fols. 182r-184v). Reinforcing strip of parchment used for quire XVII originates from a different (older?) Ms.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling. The ruling pattern is different for the canon tables.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; incipits of the chapters; Ethiopic numbers of the chapters; the word mǝʿǝraf; elements of the punctuation signs, Ethiopic numbers. Several lines on the incipit page of Texts II, III, IV and V, alternating with black lines.

otherdetails.otherdetail: Lists of the "Tituli" for the Gospels of Matthew and Mark are missing. Additiones 8, 9 (fol. 182v-183r) are written upside down (s. separate picture). The scribe highlighted some chapters using line break after the chapter number, before its incipit.

additional.cont: Fol. 9rb: Record concerning siso-land of the church of Golˁa Däbrä Bǝrhan Yoḥannǝs, donated to the church by ras Sǝbḥat.
additional.det: The note is written in Amharic. It was written on 30 Säne 1884 E.C. (= 6 July 1892 A.D.) and it mentions ras Sǝbḥat and fitäwrari Bǝrru.
The note states that ʾabba Yoḥannǝs ʾAfä Wärq was the owner of the book.

additional.cont: Fol. 12va-12vb: Extensive genealogy commissioned by Täklä Mikaˀel, starting with King Sälˀa Doba and mentioning King ˀAmdä Ṣǝyon and Giläwazgi.
additional.add: Fol. 12va: {ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘአጸኀፎ፡ ተክለ፡ ሚካኤል} ዝመጽሐፈ፡ ትውልድ፡ ሃጤ፡ ሰልአ፡ ዶባ፡ መስቀል፡ ክብራ፡ ወለደ፡ ለመስቀል፡ ክብራ፡ ሃጤ፡ አምደጽዮን፡ አግብታት፡ ካባ፡ ልብሱ፡ ወለዶች፡ ካባ፡ ልብሱ፡ በትረ፡ ሎሜዎስ፡ ወለደ፡ በትረ፡ ሎሜዎስ፡ ሮቤል፡ ወለደ፡ ሮቤል፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ወለደ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ህዝቅያስና፡ ትንሱእ፡ ወለደ፡ ትንሱእ፡ ሠረቀ፡ ብርሃን፡ እስቲፋኖስ፡[sic] ሻኮር፡ አፍኒን፡ ወለደ፡ ሠረቀ፡ ብርሃን፡ ክፍል፡ ማርያም፡ ዕቁብ፡ ወለደ፡ አፈሉም፡ ክፍል፡ ማርያም፡ አምደ፡ ስላሴ፡ ተክለ፡ ስላሴ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ወለደ፡ አምደ፡ ስላሴ፡ አፈሹም፡ ገዶ፡ ወለደ፡ ገዶ፡ ክፍለ፡ ማርያምና፡ ዕቁቢት፡ ወለደ፡ ዕቁቢት፡ ተክለ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ህተ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ጽጌ፡ ጽርሃ፡ {ጽርሐ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ካህሱ፡ ወለድት፡ ካህሱ፡ ገብረ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለተ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ቄስ፡ ገብረ፡ ሕይወት፡ ቄስ፡ ገብረ፡ ሕይወሕት፡ ተስፋ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለደ፡} ኪሮስ፡ ወለደ፡ ህተ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ እልፍዮስ፡ ወለደ፡ እልፍዮስ፡ በኵረ፡ ጽዮን፡ አቅሌስያ፡ ወለደ፡ በኵረ፡ ጽዮን፡ ኃይሉ፡ ወለደ፡ አቅሌስያ፡ ተክለ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወለዶች፡ ተክለ፡ ጊዮርጊስ። ሀብተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ወልደ፡ ገብርኤል፡ ወለደ። [fol. 12vb] ሀብተ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ኪዳን፡ ገብረ፡ መድኅን፡ ወልደ፡ {ስላሴ} ወለደ፡ ጽጌ፡ ካህሱና፡ ወልደ፡ ሙሴ፡ ወለደ፡ ፡ ዕቁብ{ት}፡ አፈሱም፡ ገብርየስ፡ ወለደ፡ ገብርየስ፡ ኃይለ፡ ሥላሴ፡ አጽቀ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ወልደ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ወለደ፡ ወልደ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ አቡነ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ ልዑል፡ ወለደ፡ ኃይለ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ዘመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ አሚት፡ ወለደ፡ ዘመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ተስፋ፡ ዮሃንስ፡ ገብረ፡ ሕይወት፡ ወልደ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወለደ፡ ተስፋ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ኤዎስጣቴዎስ፡ ወልደ፡ ስላሴ፡ ወለደ፡ ወልደ፡ ኤዎስጣቴዎስ፡ ወልደ፡ አቢየ፡ እግዚእ፡ ወለደ፡ እስጢፋኖስ፡ ጊለዋ፡ ዝጊ፡ ወለደ፡ ጊለዋ፡ ዝጊ፡ ወልደ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ አፈ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ልብሰ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ገደለ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ሩማነ፡ ወርቅ፡ ወለደ፡ አሚት፡ ወልደ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ወለዶች፡ ወልደ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ወልደ፡ ሀዋርርያት፡ ወለደ፡ ወልደ፡ ሀዋርያት፡ ወልደ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወለደ።

additional.cont: Fol. 96av: Record concerning a reconciliation after litigation over land.
additional.det: In Amharic; written during the reign of King Mǝnǝlik II (r. 1889-1913).

additional.cont: Fol. 145va: Record concerning siso-land of the church of Golˁa Däbrä Bǝrhan Yoḥannǝs.
additional.det: In Amharic; written on 30 Säne 1884 E.C. (= 06 July 1892). Mention of ras Sǝbḥat and šum ʾagame Rämḥa Śǝllase.
Written during the reign of King Menelik II (r. 1889-1913).

additional.cont: Fol. 145vb: Record concerning reconciliation between the community and its head (?).
additional.det: In Amharic; written on 14 Ṭǝqǝmt 1911 E.C. (= 21 October 1918) during the time of Queen Zäwditu and the regent ras Täfäri.

additional.cont: Fol. 182v: Recent copy of an old document (?).
additional.det: In Tǝgrǝñña, dated to 1910 year of mercy (= 1917/18 A.D.), during the time of Queen Zäwditu and šum ʿagame Kasa. The note is written upside down, or the leaf with the document already copied was inserted in this way, possibly on purpose.

In Amharic; written upside down, or the leaf with document already copied was inserted in this way. The document is dated to 21 Mäggabit 1916 E.C. (= 30 January 1924), during the time of Queen Zäwditu, the regent ras Täfäri and däğğazmač Kasa Sǝbḥat.

extras.extra: - Fols. 1r-v and 2r-v, used here as fly-leaves (?), contain portions of biblical text, written in main hand. - Pen trials: fols. 182v, 183r, 183v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - One white (fol. 25) and red threads(fols. 176, 177) are inserted in the upper right corner, for navigating in the text.
